titleStmt.title: A dialogue agaynst light, lewde, and lasciuious dauncing wherin are refuted all those reasons, which the common people vse to bring in defence thereof. Compiled and made by Christopher Fetherston.
titleStmt.author: Fetherston, Christopher.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A confutation of lasciuious dauncing.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
